settings.title: the original gourmet edible & bakeable cookie dough confectionery
kristen
settings.text:
Growing up in St. Louis, Missouri, I spent countless hours watching my Mom — a total foodie, cookbook author, and local cooking school instructor — create delicious meals for our family. I learned the ins and outs of cooking from her. At a young age, I joined her in the kitchen after wearing out multiple Easy-Bake Ovens and taking almost-weekly cooking classes at a local cooking school. With a constant craving for anything sweet, I adopted the role of resident family baker, specializing in my favorite dessert — cookies! Baking wove itself into the fabric of my childhood and quickly became my passion. I was always setting aside cookie dough for my Dad to eat when he came home from work and sneaking a few bites of the unbaked dough for myself. 

For me, the best part of making cookies is, and always has been, the pure, dough-ey goodness of the unbaked cookie. There is something undeniable about the smooth, sugary, deliciousness that comes right from the mixing bowl.

When I moved to New York City following design school, my passion for baking was as present as ever. Despite my tiny Manhattan kitchen, baking became a therapy of sorts. It was an escape from my busy schedule as a designer at a brand consultant firm and an outlet from the constant drum of the busy city. It nostalgically brings me back to my roots and grounds me when I need it most.

I love the process of trying new flavors and recipes — the journey of taking raw ingredients and transforming them into a delicious creation that can be shared. I find joy being in the kitchen and baking treats to share with the people in my life. From my kitchen to yours, enjoy the joy of sharing DŌ with your loved ones.

settings.title: began
settings.text:
During a girls’ weekend in Philadelphia, we stopped by a cookie shop for a sweet-tooth fix, but my inner child craved the unbaked dough. We bought a tub of frozen cookie dough — intended for baking — and we passed around the tub, loving every bite and laughing about the lack of cookie dough designed solely for eating in its pure form. 

From there, DŌ was born.

I was in the early stages of developing DŌ when I learned I had a gluten intolerance. My pizza-loving, bread basket indulging and cookie devouring days were behind me — or so I thought. Rather than settling with the restricted gluten-free options in the market, I began my unwavering quest to find a way to eat my favorite gluten-full foods, in a new, gluten-free way. Cookies, and dough, were no exception.

This big city girl with Midwestern roots is on a mission to bring you the best cookie dough you’ve ever had.  I have relentlessly researched, tested and tried ingredients to perfect the recipes of my favorite cookie flavors. I want everyone — regardless of dietary restrictions — to enjoy delicious cookies and cookie dough, brought to you by DŌ.

We hope you enjoy DŌ's spoon-ready deliciousness today!

settings.author_info: Growing up in St. Louis, Missouri, I spent countless hours watching my Mom — a total foodie, cookbook author, and local cooking school instructor — create delicious meals for our family. I learned the ins and outs of cooking from her...

settings.faq_title: is your dough really safe to eat unbaked?
settings.faq_description: You heard us right! Finally, a safe-to-eat cookie dough that you don’t have to pretend you are going to bake! All ingredients in each of our delicious, homemade recipes are safe to consume just as they are – unbaked. We give you peace of mind, allowing you to eat a piece of cookie dough heaven how you like it best.

settings.faq_title: are your products available for private events?
settings.faq_description: Of course! Our team will work with you to create a perfect solution for your party. Check out our Instagram for some ideas and email info@cookieDOnyc.com for more information.  There is a $100 minimum for catering. Please note: All insurance requirements must be requested 14 days prior to the event date.

settings.faq_title: can I buy a gift card?
settings.faq_description: Our gift cards are available for purchase online! Click here to order gift cards.

settings.faq_title: can you donate to my charitable event / cause?
settings.faq_description: Please fill out this form here.

settings.faq_title: but doesn’t cookie dough contain eggs?
settings.faq_description: For products that typically contain eggs, we use a pasteurized egg product. The heat process kills any potentially harmful bacteria. Yay! You can enjoy all our cookie dough products unbaked.

settings.faq_title: what about the flour you use? is it raw?
settings.faq_description: We're glad you asked! We use a heat-treated, ready-to-eat flour. At last, worry-free treats you can dig right into! YAY!

settings.faq_title: can I travel with my cookie dough?
settings.faq_description: our safe-to-eat cookie dough should be stored in the fridge or freezer. If traveling, we recommend freezing it ahead of time and sticking it in a cooler or freezer bag when in transit. You can purchase ice packs and insulated bags at our scoop shop. If flying, we recommend freezing ahead of time and checking your cookie dough with your checked luggage, beneath the plane, where it is colder and is not subject to TSA screening. We are unable to reimburse you for cookie dough that has been taken by TSA.

settings.faq_title: how should I store my cookie dough? how long will it last?
settings.faq_description: our cookie dough must be stored in the refrigerator or freezer because it contains perishable ingredients without any additives or preservatives. If refrigerated, our dough lasts up to three weeks – good luck keeping it around that long! If frozen, it should be consumed within three months.

settings.faq_title: what is the best way to keep baked cookies?
settings.faq_description: Baked cookies are best stored in an airtight container and should stay chewy and delicious for up to two weeks. They will last up to three months if frozen and will be just as tasty when you thaw them to serve!

settings.faq_title: how many cookies does one cookie dough container bake?
settings.faq_description: If you have somehow resisted the urge to eat the whole unbaked tub and want to bake your cookie dough instead, do so in a preheated 350 degree oven for 10-12 minutes or until your desired doneness is achieved. Our 8oz container will bake about 6-8 cookies.

settings.faq_title: can we buy your cookies already baked? what about cookie cakes?
settings.faq_description: YES! We sell baked cookies and custom cookie dough cakes. You can even build your own flavor if you want! We promise they will be a fan favorite at any event as well as be the perfect gift! Our 8x8 cakes feed about 9 people. Order online for pick-up or contact info@cookieDOnyc.com for more information.

settings.faq_title: is your store kosher?
settings.faq_description: We are excited to announce that our shop is certified under the National Kosher Supervision. Our Kosher certificate can be found by clicking here. Please note the Signature Chocolate Chip and Sugar Cookie mixes are not certified kosher.

settings.faq_title: do your products contain nuts?
settings.faq_description: Some of our cookie dough flavors do contain nuts. We can point you in the right direction if you have an allergy. For those who have a severe allergy, be aware we manufacture in a facility that processes peanuts and tree nuts.

settings.faq_title: are your products vegan?
settings.faq_description: We offer our chocolate chip in vegan, and our peanut butter snickerdoodle is naturally vegan (and gluten-free, too)!

settings.faq_title: what about gluten-free?
settings.faq_description: Brookie dough, cake batter, and signature chocolate chip come in a gluten-free option, and our peanut butter snickerdoodle is gluten-free also!

settings.faq_title: do you have anything that is vegan and gluten-free?
settings.faq_description: Our peanut butter snickerdoodle is vegan & gluten-free! Ask to sample it in our new shop!

settings.faq_title: do you offer nationwide shipping?
settings.faq_description: YES! View our options here!

settings.faq_title: do you ship outside the country?
settings.faq_description: At this time, we are unable to ship outside the country.

settings.faq_title: do you ship your baked goods and other cookie dough treats?
settings.faq_description: Yes! We now ship our cookies and cookie cakes. You can check them out here. Stop by the shop to try out some of our other treats or order ahead for pickup!

settings.faq_title: how soon can I receive my cookie dough?
what if I want my order to arrive on a certain date?
settings.faq_description: Choose your preferred delivery using the calendar on the cart page! Please note this is available on most but not all our products.

settings.faq_title: what if I want cookie dough sooner?
settings.faq_description: We ship your cookie dough as soon as possible, which can be delivered 3-5 business days after the order is placed.  Please plan ahead when planning for a certain date or event!

settings.faq_title: how do you ship your cookie dough?
settings.faq_description: Because of the perishable nature of our product, we take every precaution in making sure that it arrives safely and ready to eat. In order to do that, we ship it on ice in an insulated container for delivery. Read more on our shipping policies here!

settings.faq_title: can I order for delivery?
settings.faq_description: You can order delivery within Manhattan on Grubhub and Uber Eats!

settings.faq_title: what is route protection?
settings.faq_description: Route package protection is added at checkout to protect your order in case of delays or lost/stolen packages.

settings.faq_title: what if I don't want route protection?
settings.faq_description: No worries! If you do not want to protect your order, you can uncheck the box at checkout or remove the "route protection" item from your cart.

settings.faq_title: I bought route & my package didn't arrive, what do I do?
settings.faq_description: Just file a claim here and we will help you.

settings.faq_title: what items are available for pickup?
settings.faq_description: You can check out all our pickup options here!

settings.faq_title: when will my order be ready?
settings.faq_description: Orders are typically ready within a 24 hour window during the week. Cookie cake orders must be placed by noon on Thursday to be ready for weekend pick-up. Orders placed on weekends will be ready on Tuesday, the earliest. Let us know at checkout when you would like to pick up your order.

settings.faq_title: how will I know when I can come to pick up my order?
settings.faq_description: When your order is ready for pickup, you will receive a "Ready for Pickup" email.

settings.faq_title: can someone else pick up the order for me?
settings.faq_description: You can pick up the order yourself or designate someone else to pick up the order for you. If you choose to designate someone else to pick up, they will need to provide the order number and the confirmation email at the time of pick up.

settings.faq_title: where do I pick up my order?
settings.faq_description: Our only pickup location is at our flagship scoop shop located at 550 LaGuardia Place New York, NY 10012.

settings.faq_title: how long will the shop hold my order?
settings.faq_description: We will hold orders only for 48 hours after the designated pickup day. Please contact us and we'll gladly work with you if you can't pickup within that timeframe.

settings.faq_title: can I use more than one discount code at checkout?
settings.faq_description: No, you can not. Only one discount code is valid at checkout.

settings.faq_title: does living in a different timezone affect when I can use discount or promotional codes?
settings.faq_description: Yes, it does! The majority of our promotions end on midnight EST. Please make sure you take note when our promotions are valid until.

settings.faq_title: is there anything I should know about the 'spin the wheel' discount codes?
settings.faq_description: Yes! The free product codes are valid with purchase only. The product must be added to cart for the code to work. Free shipping is only valid on standard shipping rates. Each code is only valid one time per customer.

settings.faq_title: are discount codes eligible to be used on everything?
settings.faq_description: Unfortunately no, certain discount codes have specific limitations. Discount codes are not valid on classes, gift cards, catering orders, subscriptions or past purchases.

settings.faq_title: are the free shipping promos applicable on everything?
settings.faq_description: Free shipping is not applicable on our heat-treated flour products, catering orders or gift cards.

settings.setion_description: Choose your desired delivery date on the cart page!

Make sure to enter your pickup date and time during checkout! Please note all pickup orders take at least 24 hours to prepare from the time of your order for weekday orders. Weekend orders will be available for pickup on Tuesday at 10 AM. Email us for more details!
Have a custom order idea? Contact us!

• Items are prepared fresh and shipped directly from our flagship.

  • Cookie DŌ ships Monday-Thursday of each week.

  • No deliveries Saturday, Sunday or Monday.

  • Orders cannot be shipped to P.O. Boxes.

  • Orders shipped to Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico will incur an additional $25 charge.

settings.chef_description: Feel free to email us at info@cookieDOnyc.com or use our contact form. Have a DŌlicous Day!

settings.request_description: Are you part of an organization in need? Please fill out our request form. Thank you for your consideration. Please note that due to the high volume of inquiries we receive, we unfortunately are not able to respond to all requests.
settings.doserves_title: Nominate someone who dōserves something sweet!
settings.doserves_description:
Know an individual or family who could use something sweet? We’d like to help you recognize anyone in your community who you feel goes above and beyond to make your life a little sweeter, or could use something sweet to brighten their day. We accept any and all of a diverse range of applicants — a teacher who’s gone the extra mile for your education, a neighbor who’s made a difference in your community, a friend who’s always there for you, a family who’s been going through a tough time, and more!

Have someone in mind? Fill out a nomination form here.

settings.title: Donations
settings.text: At DŌ, our mission is to sweeten each moment, and it is with care that we apply this philosophy in every aspect of our business. In baking, the most important ingredient to success is care, and it is our opinion that care is at the heart of our business’ success as well. We, at DŌ, are proud to put a priority on charitable giving and community outreach, in an effort to sweeten the lives of those in need. DŌ’s charitable platform emphasizes partnering with organizations active in our own community whose primary efforts are benefitting the lives of women and children, fighting hunger, and supporting youth development, to name a few. We are proud to volunteer our time, resources, and energy to work hands on with our charitable partners, in addition to providing in-kind donations for organizations in need.

settings.title: a donation
settings.text: Are you part of an organization in need? Please fill out our request form. Please note that due to the high volume of inquiries we receive, we unfortunately are not able to respond to all requests.

settings.title: freshness & storage
settings.text: Your DŌ is freshly made with lots of love. Store your cookie dough in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks or freezer for up to 3 months.

settings.title: serving size
settings.text: Our 8oz contains 2-3 servings. If baked, it can make 6-8 cookies, depending on the cookie size.

settings.title: eat it or bake it
settings.text: Eat this cookie dough as-is (yay!), mix it into your favorite ice cream, or make a fresh batch of cookies! Bake chilled tablespoons at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until your desired done-ness. Enjoy!

settings.title: shipping details
settings.text: We ship Monday - Thursday via UPS. The cookie dough is perishable, so we ship in insulated containers with ice for delivery. All of our cookie dough is prepared to order. You can request a delivery date at checkout. We will make every effort to have it arrive on your desired date. Read more about our shipping policies and order cut off times here.

settings.text: Your DŌ is freshly made with lots of love. Store your cookie dough in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks or freezer for up to 3 months.

settings.title: serving size
settings.text: Our 8oz contains 2-3 servings. If baked, it can make 6-8 cookies, depending on the cookie size.

settings.title: eat it or bake it
settings.text: Eat this cookie dough as-is (yay!), mix it into your favorite ice cream, or make a fresh batch of cookies! Bake chilled tablespoons at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until your desired done-ness. Enjoy!

settings.title: shipping details
settings.text: We ship Monday - Thursday via UPS. The cookie dough is perishable, so we ship in insulated containers with ice for delivery. All of our cookie dough is prepared to order. You can request a delivery date at checkout. We will make every effort to have it arrive on your desired date. Read more about our shipping policies and order cut off times here.

settings.faq_title: Libbie C.
settings.faq_description: "Everyone LOVED Cookie DŌ NYC! It was a huge hit!

settings.faq_title: Marie L.
settings.faq_description: "OMG! They were all gone within 15 minutes! Total animals over here :) Only the biggest and best raving reviews!"

settings.faq_title: Susan A.
settings.faq_description: The DO was a huge hit!!! I can't wait to have another party so I can order it again :)"

settings.faq_title: Amanda H.
settings.faq_description: "Everything was great! Thank you for being flexible and making this an incredible event for our client."

settings.faq_title: Allison A.
settings.faq_description: "So delicious! Thanks for helping make my husbands' birthday so special."

settings.faq_title: Lauren A.
settings.faq_description: "Thank you for being so wonderful! You made everything seamless. It was fantastic working with you. xo"

settings.faq_title: Brandon L.
settings.faq_description: "Surely I must've died and gone to sweet-tooth heaven! Luckily, for lovers of all things sweet, DŌ is everything you could ever want in a cookie dough (and more)... To top it off, Kristen (the owner) and her staff are always prompt, professional, and super accommodating."

settings.faq_title: Ruchi B.
settings.faq_description: "People RAVED about the cookie dough dessert! Yum!"

settings.faq_title: Rori J.
settings.faq_description: "The kids loved the cookie dough! The mad rush for it was insane!! You were a pleasure to work with - thank you so much - great customer service!"

settings.faq_title: Claudia J.
settings.faq_description: "This magical cookie dough factory smells amazing inside and it is so colorful! I'd imagine it's what it would look like if the Keebler Elves' cookie factory and the Candy Land board game came to life."

settings.title: freshness & storage
settings.text: Your DŌ is freshly made with lots of love. Store your cookie dough in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks or freezer for up to 3 months.

settings.title: serving size
settings.text: Our 8oz contains 2-3 servings. If baked, it can make 6-8 cookies, depending on the cookie size.

settings.title: eat it or bake it
settings.text: Eat this cookie dough as-is (yay!), mix it into your favorite ice cream, or make a fresh batch of cookies! Bake chilled tablespoons at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until your desired done-ness. Enjoy!

settings.title: shipping details
settings.text: We ship Monday - Thursday via UPS. The cookie dough is perishable, so we ship in insulated containers with ice for delivery. All of our cookie dough is prepared to order. You can request a delivery date at checkout. We will make every effort to have it arrive on your desired date. Read more about our shipping policies and order cut off times here.

settings.right_content:
WHAT TO KNOW

You may bring pre-approved decorations and beverages. Access to the kitchen is available 30 minutes before your event start time. See next page for all policies and details.


ADDITIONAL FEES

Outside food & beverages: Up to $100 fee. Items must be approved prior to event.


ADDITIONAL TREATS

Cookies $2.75 ea. | Brookies $5 ea. | Fudge $4 ea. | Cookie Bomb $5.50 ea. | Milk $3.25 ea. | Bite Box $16


PARTY FAVORS

T-Shirt $25 | Hat $30 | Spatula $14 | Sprinkle Jar $12


BOOK NOW!
A 50% deposit is required to reserve a date and time. Email or call our shop directly to book your event. theacadomy@cookiedonyc.com

settings.text:
We’re thrilled to host some of our favorite bakers, personalities, and all around boss ladies at our headquarters to show us how they dough it. Join these special guests and DŌ founder, Kristen Tomlan in our private kitchen for an exclusive baking class.

From baking techniques, to special ingredients, and even a little advice on how they make their dreams come true. Master Class has it all - and a side of cookie dough :)

settings.title: Postponed Until Further Notice
settings.subtitle: Master Class with Lucie Fink
settings.text:
Kristen is BACK in the kitchen with video producer and media personality Lucie Fink creating a BRAND NEW cookie dough flavor! Join us both in the kitchen to create the secret flavor with Lucie from scratch! this class supports the Lower Eastside Girls Club of NY. This ticket includes the Meet & Greet with Lucie!

 
MASTERCLASS TICKETS
 

Following the class, meet Lucie for a Q&A, mixing and mingling, and delicious edible cookie dough! We’ll laugh, share business and life insights, and take loads of photos!

 
MEET & GREET TICKETS

settings.title: Thank you to all of our AMAZING Master Class hosts!
settings.subtitle: Master Class with Sally McKenney
settings.text: Known for her “baking addiction” Sally McKenny has blogged and baked her way into our hearts. Sally joined Kristen Tomlan for a class supporting For Goodness Cakes Philadelphia Chapter.

settings.subtitle: Master Class with Chelsey White
settings.text: With colorful frosting, and simple yet beautiful techniques, Chelsey White, of Chelsweets, garnered millions of views with her captivating videos and baking tutorials. Chelsey joined Kristen Tomlan for a class supporting She's the First.

settings.subtitle: Master Class with Emily Ely of Wölffer Estate Vineyard
settings.text: It was a cookie dough making and wine tasting extravaganza! Kristen Tomlan and Emily Ely teamed up in the kitchen to make Kristen's Rosé All Day cookie dough from her new cookbook, Hello, Cookie Dough!

settings.subtitle: Master Class with Emily Hutchinson
settings.text: Kristen Tomlan and Emily Hutchinson, creator of the popular blog, The Hutch Oven, made special recipes from Emily's new cookbook, Creative Cookie Decorating. Check out our recap below!

settings.subtitle: Master Class with Sweetapolita
settings.text: Rosie Alyea, also known as, Sweetapolita, stopped by our private kitchen to decorate a cake from her cookbook, The Sweetapolita Bakebook. It was sprinkle heaven!

settings.subtitle: Master Class with Dana Pollack
settings.text: Dana Pollack of Dana's Bakery joined Kristen Tomlan in making Dana's insta-famous and innovative Rainbow Black & White cookies!

settings.title: freshness & storage
settings.text: Your DŌ is freshly made with lots of love. Store your cookie dough in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks or freezer for up to 3 months.

settings.title: servinig size
settings.text: Our 8oz contains 2-3 servings. If baked, it can make 6-8 cookies, depending on the cookie size.

settings.title: eat it or bake it
settings.text: Eat this cookie dough as-is (yay!), mix it into your favorite ice cream, or make a fresh batch of cookies! Bake chilled tablespoons at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until your desired done-ness. Enjoy!

settings.title: shipping details
settings.text: We ship Monday - Thursday via UPS. The cookie dough is perishable, so we ship in insulated containers with ice for delivery. All of our cookie dough is prepared to order. You can request a delivery date at checkout. We will make every effort to have it arrive on your desired date. Read more about our shipping policies and order cut off times here.

settings.title: Pick Your Package
settings.text: Choose from a number of different edible cookie dough and baked treats based on your vision and budget!

settings.title: Choose Your Flavors
settings.text: Pick from a selection of bestsellers and seasonal favorites. With something for everyone (including gluten-free and vegan options) it’s bound to be sweet!

settings.title: Make It Special
settings.text: Make it yours by adding a unique logo, message or design to any package! Customize the cookie dough, the container, the gift box, the note and more!

settings.title: Corporate Gifting give the gift of something sweet!
settings.text: Send cookie dough to your clients, employees, friends & more! We’ll work together to create the perfect gift to show them how much you care. Email info@cookiedonyc.com with any inquiries, we can’t wait to hear from you!

settings.left_description:
We’ve popped up at Bryant Park again this holiday season! Doughlicious treats and exclusive flavors are now available at the Holiday Shops at Bryant Park for the most wonderful time of the year!
Find us at booth #N10, located on the north side of the park, on 42nd St. across from Sweetgreen.

Our Bryant Park pop-up is closing January 3!

Christmas Eve (Dec.24)//8:30am - 10pm
Christmas Day (Dec. 25)//Closed

monday // 11am - 8pm
tuesday // 11am - 8pm
wednesday // 11am - 8pm
thursday // 11am - 8pm
friday // 11am - 9pm
saturday//10am - 9pm
sunday // 10am – 8pm


*Hours Are Subject To Change
